body: I just googled Masaharu Fukuyama, and man, I’m surprised that I didn’t know him before this. A Doujin teaching me something xD
God forgive me for my sins for i have become a vanillafag
As always, Germans being the men of logic
Always remember, just cause the girl is short doesn't mean it's a loli
Great art and proportions, too. (I may just have a kink for large guys with small girls (NOT lolis), but even so, this is a masterpiece.)

DOUJIN 👏 REVIEW 👏 Great characters, great premise, great execution. She doesn’t look like a loli, which is awesome. Many doujins with similar stories take this opportunity to just make it a lolicon, but the author didn’t here. Very little cringe, the only real cringe part is at the beginning when he gets hard, but not only is that a minor thing, both characters also actually handled it well instead of just getting flustered. This is a true 10/10.
"you should've at least told me your name before we started. i wanted to shout it" lol'd
I think this shit influenced my fetishes for years to come
lol that last panel haha that cat said basically dont touch me woman
It's kind of fresh,seeing hentai author draw different eyes concept
Would she count as an oppai loli? I wonder....
So she decides to help out his hurt leg but on page 5 she stomps on his other leg. True Doctorship, "See, the new pain makes the old one hurt less!" XD
